panels.description: Measures movement of the writer checkpoint
panels.title: Bytes Written

panels.description:
0 is the Current chunk. 1 is the prevous chunk etc.
Visualizes where data is being read from in the log relative to the tail. Helps to set ChunkCache size and Archive retention policy.
panels.title: Chunk Read Distribution

panels.description: TODO consider if rate is the right function here
panels.title: Approx Events Sizes

panels.description:
The rate at which messages are being parked. Includes the reason (explicit nak from client vs max retry limit reached by the server).

v25.0.1+
panels.title: Park Message Requests Rate

panels.description:
Count of parked message replay requests.

v25.0.1+
panels.title: Parked Message Replay Requests
Example: Execution duration distribution of "my-projection": "$any" function

panels.description:
25.1+
Only projection states that are >= 60% of MaxProjectionStateSize are shown.
panels.title: Large Projection States

panels.description: % of the time that the queue is actively processing messages.
panels.title: Queue Busyness

panels.description:
Requires `Queues.Processing` to be enabled in the telemetry configuration. Not usually recommended.

This is counting how many messages are actually processed. It is not extrapolating from the time it takes to process a message.
panels.title: Message processed by Type

panels.description:
Requires `Queues.Processing` to be enabled in the telemetry configuration. Not usually recommended.

This is counting how many messages are actually processed. It is not extrapolating from the time it takes to process a message.
panels.title: Messages processed by Queue
